entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
